__e: The shield is powered and ready.
More since we've taken down the shield.
But here below the shield we are protected and safe.
Oh, so I'm your bullet shield.
Truthfully, I was hoping your shield would be knocked out by now.
Something appears to have happened to your shield, General.
For these six years past, you have seen neither kinsman nor any friend, but blade, shield and shaft.
Drop the shield and get your hands in the air!
Marcus, attend him in his ecstasy that hath more scars of sorrow in his heart than foemen's marks upon his battered shield, but yet so just that he will not revenge.
